marketplaces.name: openwebf
marketplaces.description: Open-source, self-hosted Claude Code marketplace for OpenWebF/WebF developer tooling (WebF app workflow, Flutter host integration, MCP offline docs).

files.README.md:
# OpenWebF Claude Code Marketplace

[English](README.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)

This repo is an open-source, self-hosted Claude Code marketplace containing the `webf` plugin (install from a local path or directly from GitHub).

## Install

### Local dev (this repo)

1. Start Claude Code in the repo root.
2. Add the marketplace:
   - `/plugin marketplace add ./`
3. Install the plugin:
   - `/plugin install webf@openwebf`
4. Start here:
   - `/webf:help`

### GitHub repo (recommended)

1. Publish (or fork) this repo on GitHub.
2. Add the repo as a marketplace source and install the plugin:
   - `/plugin marketplace add <owner>/<repo>`
   - `/plugin install webf@openwebf`

## Migration (old `openwebf` plugin)

- `0.3.0` renamed the plugin from `openwebf` → `webf`.
- Slash commands changed from `/openwebf:*` → `/webf:*`.
- If you previously installed `openwebf@openwebf`, uninstall it and install `webf@openwebf`, then restart Claude Code.

## Docs

- Plugin overview: [webf-plugin/README.md](webf-plugin/README.md) / [webf-plugin/README.zh-CN.md](webf-plugin/README.zh-CN.md)
- Full guide: [webf-plugin/DOCUMENTATION.md](webf-plugin/DOCUMENTATION.md) / [webf-plugin/DOCUMENTATION.zh-CN.md](webf-plugin/DOCUMENTATION.zh-CN.md)
- Maintainers / release: [webf-plugin/RELEASE.md](webf-plugin/RELEASE.md)
- Changelog: [webf-plugin/CHANGELOG.md](webf-plugin/CHANGELOG.md)

## Repo layout

- Marketplace manifest: `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
- Plugin source: `webf-plugin/`

## Maintainers

See [webf-plugin/RELEASE.md](webf-plugin/RELEASE.md).
files.webf-plugin/README.md:
# `webf` (Claude Code plugin)

[English](README.md) | [简体中文](README.zh-CN.md)

Developer tools for OpenWebF/WebF projects: WebF app workflow + Flutter host integration + offline docs/templates.

## Start here

- `/webf:help` (recommended entry point)
- `/webf:init` (guided setup + optional templates)
- `/webf:doctor` (repo diagnosis + next steps)
- `/webf:docs <query>` (offline docs search)

## Install

### Local dev (this repo)

1. Start Claude Code in the repo root.
2. Add the marketplace: `/plugin marketplace add ./`
3. Install the plugin: `/plugin install webf@openwebf`

### GitHub repo (recommended)

- Publish (or fork) this repo on GitHub, then:
  - `/plugin marketplace add <owner>/<repo>`
- `/plugin install webf@openwebf`

## What it can do

- WebF app workflow: Vite/React/TS + WebF Go, testing, CDN deploy
- Flutter host integration: embedding, `WebFBundle` loading, routing, theming, caching, performance metrics
- Bridge modules + hybrid UI components
- Release and compliance checklists (caching/versioning/rollback + store guidelines)
- Offline-first OpenWebF docs + templates via a bundled MCP server

## Command set

Entry: `help`, `init`, `doctor`, `docs`

WebF app: `app-quickstart`, `app-dev-workflow`, `app-testing`, `app-deploy-assets`

Flutter host: `host-add-webf`, `host-embedding`, `host-hybrid-routing`, `host-theming`, `host-caching`, `host-performance`

Bridge / hybrid UI: `bridge-module`, `hybrid-ui`

Release / security: `security-review`, `store-guidelines`, `release-check`

Maintainers: `docs-update` (refresh bundled docs snapshot)

## Templates

Templates are bundled scaffolds grouped by prefix: `host/*`, `routing/*`, `perf/*`, `bridge-module/*`, `hybrid-ui/*`, `app/*`.

Browse/apply templates from Claude Code:

- `/webf:help`
- `/webf:init`

Full catalog: [DOCUMENTATION.md](DOCUMENTATION.md).

## Documentation

- Full guide: [DOCUMENTATION.md](DOCUMENTATION.md) / [DOCUMENTATION.zh-CN.md](DOCUMENTATION.zh-CN.md)
- Changelog: [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md)
- Maintainers + release checklist: [RELEASE.md](RELEASE.md)

## Troubleshooting

- Commands are `/webf:*` (not a standalone `webf` CLI command).
- If you previously installed `openwebf@openwebf`, uninstall it and install `webf@openwebf` (commands moved from `/openwebf:*` → `/webf:*`).
- If commands don’t appear after install/update, restart Claude Code.
- For repo-specific next steps, run `/webf:doctor`.
